notifications.title: Your tax statement for 2019 is ready
notifications.desc:
This tax statement contains all information on tax-relevant assets and income. The tax values generally comply with the Swiss Federal Tax Administrationâ€™s guidelines for direct federal tax. The information on income comprises all tax-relevant amounts accrued during the tax period and known at the time of preparation of the tax statement according to the exchange list of the Swiss Federal Tax Administration.

Securities and investment income are valued at prices and values from available sources of information customary in the industry. Yova AG disclaims any liability for the accuracy and completeness of the information provided by the customer or third parties. Benefits and non-benefits of the information contained in this tax statement are the responsibility of the customer.

The tax statement is tailored to the needs of private individuals with unlimited tax liability in Switzerland. Information on the tax treatment of the tax credit, asset management costs and the like is not binding.
